seo.title: Interrail/Italy Rail Pass: Visiting the Amalfi Coast
seo.description: How to use rail passes to reach the coast, plus last‑mile details to Positano.

intro: Using an Interrail/Italy Rail Pass to reach the Amalfi Coast: which lines to take, required supplements, and how to cover the last leg to Positano.

sections.title: Core routes
body: Rome → Naples/Salerno high-speed; local trains to Sorrento; buses to Positano.

sections.title: Supplements/reservations
body: Frecciarossa/Italo often require seat reservations; regional trains don’t but can be crowded.

sections.title: Last mile to Positano
body: From Naples: Circumvesuviana to Sorrento then SITA bus. From Salerno: ferry/bus in season.

a: Only if taking enough long-distance segments; otherwise point-to-point can be cheaper.
